db.orientdb.control

Class OrientDBBaseConfigurationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.orientdb.control.OrientDBBaseConfigurationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseConfigurationController

    public final class OrientDBBaseConfigurationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseConfigurationController
    Implements BaseConfigurationController using OrientDB as the database backend.

    TODO: Currently the complete database structure has to be in memory for im-/export to work. There should be a better solution.

    Author:
    Stefan Werner

                                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new orient db base configuration controller.
        Parameters:
        dbBaseConfig - the db base configuration to read from and write to
        dbController - the db controller
        logConnector - the log connector
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is an error within the database

      • importConfiguration

        private boolean importConfiguration(java.io.InputStream in,
                                    boolean clearBeforeImport,
                                    boolean overwrite,
                                    boolean importAll,
                                    boolean importPortConnections,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> moduleIdsToImport,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ciIdsToImport)
        Imports configuration partly.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream to read from
        clearBeforeImport - set to true to clear database before import
        overwrite - set to true to overwrite existing data (if any)
        importAll - true import all data
        importPortConnections - set to true to import port connections
        moduleIdsToImport - the module IDs to import
        ciIdsToImport - the CI IDs to import
        Returns:
        true, if successful
